TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Principal extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class Principal Implements IDisposable
public ref class Principal abstract : IDisposable

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the account data and operations common to all security principals. This is the abstract base class from which all security principals are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自這個類別的自訂延伸模組類別可以呼叫這個建構函式，從衍生的類別建構函式來初始化基底類別。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 主體擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概觀主題。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會檢查之前它會判斷是否已刪除的物件是否已經過處置。

The method has been called on this principal object.

Docs.summary: Returns a principal object that matches the specified identity value.

Docs.param: The that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
The identity of the principal. This parameter can be any format that is contained in the enumeration.
Docs.summary: Returns a principal object that matches the specified identity value.
Docs.returns: A object that matches the specified identity value and type, or null if no matches are found.
Docs.exception: Multiple principal objects matching the current object were found.

Docs.summary: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個多載的方法只會傳回主體是哪些直接成員的群組不執行任何遞迴搜尋。 遞迴搜尋結果可供使用者主體物件。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A> 方法。
如果主體存放區是 AD DS，群組的清單會包含使用者的主要群組識別碼屬性，在 AD DS 物件中所指定的主要群組。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups() cil managed
Public Function GetGroups () As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

Docs.summary: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.
Docs.returns: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法只會傳回群組的主體直接為成員;不執行任何遞迴搜尋。 遞迴搜尋結果可供使用者主體物件。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A> 方法。
這個方法所傳回的群組可能包含來自不同的範圍和儲存在主體的群組。 例如，如果主體是具有 DN 的 AD DS 物件"CN = SpecialGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com，傳回的集合可以包含屬於群組"CN = NormalGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com。
如果目前的主體是 AD DS 主體，傳回的群組會包含主體的主要群組，在 AD DS 物件上的 「 primaryGroupId"屬性所指示。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext contextToQuery) cil managed
Public Function GetGroups (contextToQuery As PrincipalContext) As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

Docs.param: The object that specifies the context against which the query is performed. When the context is located in another domain, the query is performed against the principal objects' representation in the specified context.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of group objects that the principal is a member of and that exist in the store provided by the specified context parameter.
Docs.returns: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法只會傳回群組的主體直接為成員;不執行任何遞迴搜尋。 遞迴搜尋結果可供使用者主體物件。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A> 方法。
這個方法所傳回的群組可能包含來自不同的範圍和儲存在主體的群組。 例如，如果主體是具有 DN 的 AD DS 物件"CN = SpecialGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com，傳回的集合可以包含屬於群組"CN = NormalGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com。
如果目前的主體是 AD DS 主體，傳回的群組的 AD DS 物件的主要群組識別碼屬性所指定，就會包含主體的主要群組。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的主體是 AD DS 主體，則傳回的群組會包含主體的主要群組，以在 AD DS 物件上的主要群組 ID 屬性。

Docs.summary: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store. If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the store.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

Docs.summary: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store. If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the store.
Docs.exception: The principal has not yet been associated with a object. This type of principal cannot be inserted in the store.
An exception occurred when saving changes tnso the store, or updating the group membership in the store.
The principal already occurs in the store.
The password does not meet complexity requirements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
Docs.summary: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store. If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the specified context. If the principal has already been persisted, it is moved from the original context to the specified context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的主體內容不同於現有的內容，主體會移至指定的內容，且主體的物件不再位於舊的位置。 如果指定的內容是相同的現有內容，此方法會儲存至存放區在主體物件上所做的更新。 指定內容的內容型別必須是目前的內容型別相同的型別。 使用電腦內容型別時，可能不呼叫這個方法。

Docs.exception: The principal has not yet been associated with a object. This type of principal cannot be inserted in the store.
An exception occurred when saving changes to the store, or updating the group membership in the store.
The principal already occurs in the store.
The password does not meet complexity requirements.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the user principal name (UPN) associated with this principal.
Docs.value: 與此主體相關聯的 UPN，或是 Null (若尚未設定 UPN)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設為 null 的移除現有的 UPN，如果有的話。

Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.
